name: Martian Jungle
description:
A soldier gets sent to the prison planet of mars because of his past. Now he is on his own against the inmates, hunting parties and the wildlife. Write your own story in this text based adventure with top down shooter elements.

Team Members : Tolunay Genç , Caner Pekgönenç , Batuhan Gözlüklü , Erdem Güner , Mehmetcan Önçırak
